bal_devnet_updates.highlight: bal-devnet-1 stable; most clients syncing, benchmarking deferred to devnet-2
bal-devnet-2 targets Wednesday launch with finalized Amsterdam EIP scope

glamsterdam_eip_scope.highlight: EIP-7843 (SLOTNUM opcode) kept in devnet-2; engine API changes
EIP-7778 adds new receipt field for post-refund gas tracking
EIP-7708 uses system address for ETH transfer logs; withdrawals separate
EIP-8037 CFI'd; dynamic state growth pricing with separate metering

state_growth_discussion.highlight: 8037 allows single tx consuming full block via state growth
Single max-state tx still limited to 16.7M compute gas
Dynamic pricing linked to gas limit; concerns about smart contract assumptions
Gathering app developer feedback on dynamic cost implications

builder_api_integration.highlight: Discussing absorbing MEV-Boost functionality into CL clients for Amsterdam
Builder API must be implemented in vanilla CL clients
Blind signing won't exist with ePBS; only direct builder contact
Standardizing client flags (min-bid, bid-boost) in builder specs

action_items.action: Provide devnet-2 ready images to Stefan by Wednesday
Update ePBS specs page with devnet-0 scope caveats
Review ePBS PRs 4826, 4817, 4843 async on Discord
Schedule breakout call for EIP-8037 iteration
Gather app developer feedback on dynamic state costs
Continue builder API discussion async on Discord

decisions.decision: EIP-8024 push postfix change rejected for devnet-2
EIP-7778 includes new receipt field for post-refund gas
EIP-7708 uses system address; iterates on exact implementation details
ePBS devnet-0 excludes external builders and P2P bid broadcast
EIP-8037 CFI'd; async iteration on dynamic pricing concerns

targets.target: Wednesday (January 22) - bal-devnet-2 launch with Amsterdam EIPs
